title: KIM SWITCH / END OF DAY
description: Kim wants to call it a day.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I think I need to talk to the cafe..."
dialogueTree.english: "I think I need to talk to the cafeteria manager about my room..."
dialogueTree.polish: „Muszę chyba porozmawiać z kierownikiem baru o moim pokoju...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Мне трэба, напэўна, пагаварыць з кіраўніком бара пра мой пакой..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You certainly have been avoiding i..."
links.belarusian: "Да гэтага часу ты стараўся гэтага пазбягаць".

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I haven't paid the cafeteria manag..."
dialogueTree.english: "I haven't paid the cafeteria manager for damages yet."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie zapłaciłem jeszcze kierownikowi baru za szkody”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Я яшчэ не заплаціў кіраўніку бара за шкоду".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You should take care of that, then.""
links.english: "You should take care of that, then."
links.polish: „W takim razie powinieneś się tym zająć”.
links.belarusian: "У такім разе ты павінен гэтым заняцца".

links.title: You: ""I think I have the money now. This..."
links.english: "I think I have the money now. This is money, right?" (Show him reál bills.)
links.polish: „Chyba mam już pieniądze. To są pieniądze, prawda?” (Pokaż mu banknoty reáli).
links.belarusian: "Мабыць, у мяне ўжо ёсць грошы. Гэта ж грошы, праўда?" (Пакажы яму банкноты рэалаў).

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "I'll also take a room at..."
links.english: He nods. "I'll also take a room at the Whirling. One cannot get much closer to the crime scene."
links.polish: Kiwa głową. „Też wynająłem pokój w Whirling. Bliżej miejsca zbrodni zamieszkać się nie da”.
links.belarusian: Ківае галавой. "Таксама зняў пакой у Whirling. Бліжэй да месца злачынства пасяліцца нельга".

links.title: Empathy: "He's proud of you for getting your..."
links.english: He's proud of you for getting your act together and finding a way to pay back what you owe.
links.polish: Jest z ciebie dumny, że zebrałeś się w sobie i znalazłeś sposób na spłacenie tego, co byłeś winien.
links.belarusian: Ганаруся табой, што сабраўся і знайшоў спосаб сплаціць тое, што быў вінны.

links.title: You: ""But I don't have the money...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's talk to him anyway. An offic..."
links.english: "Let's talk to him anyway. An officer of the RCM shouldn't be sleeping in the streets. We'll figure something out."
links.polish: „Porozmawiajmy z nim mimo to. Funkcjonariusz MOR-u nie powinien spać na ulicy. Coś wymyślimy”.
links.belarusian: "Пагаворым з ім усё адно. Супрацоўнік РГМ не павінен спаць на вуліцы. Што-небудзь прыдумаем".

links.title: Empathy: "Though he finds this situation frus..."
links.english: Though he finds this situation frustrating, he is doing his best to not make you feel any worse than you already do.
links.polish: Choć sytuacja mocno go frustruje, robi, co może, żebyś nie musiał czuć się jeszcze gorzej niż teraz.
links.belarusian: Хоць сітуацыя моцна яго засмучае, ён робіць усё магчымае, каб ты не адчуваў сябе яшчэ горш, чым цяпер.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can pick up where we left off t..."
links.english: "We can pick up where we left off tomorrow morning."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's continue tomorrow, bright an..."
links.english: "Let's continue tomorrow, bright and early -- 7:30 sharp. I'll be waiting downstairs."
links.polish: „Kontynuujmy jutro, skoro świt – punktualnie o 7:30. Będę czekał na dole”.
links.belarusian: "Працягнемо заўтра, ледзь толькі світае — пунктуальна ў 7:30. Я буду чакаць унізе".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll also take a room at the Whirl..."
links.english: "I'll also take a room at the Whirling."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Then I should check in with the ca..."
dialogueTree.english: "Then I should check in with the cafeteria manager."
dialogueTree.polish: „W takim razie muszę się zgłosić do kierownika baru”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "У такім выпадку я мушу звярнуцца да кіраўніка бара".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do that. I'll be waiting for you d..."
links.english: "Do that. I'll be waiting for you downstairs tomorrow."
links.polish: „Zajmij się tym. Będę na ciebie czekał jutro na dole”.
links.belarusian: "Разбярыся з гэтым. Я буду чакаць цябе заўтра ўнізе."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I found lodgings in the village. I..."
dialogueTree.english: "I found lodgings in the village. I'll spend the night there."
dialogueTree.polish: „Znalazłem sobie miejsce do spania w wiosce. Tam spędzę noc”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Я знайшоў сабе месца для сну ў вёсцы. Там правяду ноч".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good to know. I'll be wherever is..."
links.english: "Good to know. I'll be wherever is necessary in the morning. Bright and early, 7:30 sharp."
links.polish: „Dobrze wiedzieć. Pojawię się tam, gdzie trzeba, rano. Skoro świt, punktualnie o 7:30”.
links.belarusian: "Добра ведаць. З"яўлюся там, дзе трэба, раніцай. На світа, дакладна а 7:30".
